sourcesContent:
Internal server error -refresing this page will make the erorr disappear

Error : {{error.message}}

Note : If you are seeing this then angular is probably not to be blame

What to be next ?

  1. Open Chrome dev tools! then check the failing request in the network tab
  2. Examine the request URL -what API endpoint
  3. Reproduce the problem in postman -if we get same error angular is 100% not the problem

flowing is the stack tracke -the first few lines will tell you which line of code caused the issue in the web

{{error.details}}
